Instruction: Peel the carrots and slice them into thin rounds or strips.
Heat vegetable oil in a large skillet or wok over medium-high heat.
Add minced ginger to the skillet and stir-fry for about 30 seconds, until fragrant.
Add the sliced carrots to the skillet and continue to stir-fry for 3-4 minutes,  until they start to soften.
In a small bowl,  mix soy sauce and honey until well combined.
Pour the soy sauce mixture over the carrots in the skillet and toss to coat evenly.
Continue to stir-fry for another 2-3 minutes,  or until the carrots are tender but still slightly crisp.
Remove from heat and garnish with sliced green onions.
Serve hot as a tasty side dish.
